pageProduct.name: Swisse Beauty Vitamin C 10% Brightening Booster Serum 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Swisse Beauty Vitamin C 10% Brightening Booster Serum is a transformative formula, containing scientifically proven beauty actives that boost & brighten the skin. This correcting serum helps to reduce the appearance of pigmentation, dark spots & uneven skin tone, while providing antioxidant protection that prevents signs of premature ageing.

Swisse Beauty Vitamin C 10% Brightening Booster Serum is a transformative formula, containing scientifically proven beauty actives that boost & brighten the skin. This correcting serum helps to reduce the appearance of pigmentation, dark spots & uneven skin tone, while providing antioxidant protection that prevents signs of premature ageing.

Size: 30ml

Directions

For a transformative result, apply every morning to face, neck and décolletage after cleansing.
